attributes.action: Mr. Tony Blair to take over leadership of the Labour Party
attributes.additional_details:
I strongly believe that no one currently in the Labour party has the ability and experience to lead our party through this difficult period.
We need a leader who is strong willed,determined and dedicated to do what is best for our party especially through this period of uncertainty .
Please join with me in nominating Mr Tony Blair to take over leadership of our Labour party so we can once again have a voice and stand up for what we truly believe in.
attributes.background:
With the United kingdom voting to leave the European Union the Labour party has crumbled.
In a time when we need strong leadership ,when we need to stand and work together the Labour party has turned on each other.
We need a leader who is strong willed,dedicated and determined to lead our party.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
